website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for customers who want a versatile set of glass containers with extra-large storage capacity.
pros: Includes one each 27 oz., 40 oz., and 74 oz
Safe for microwave, oven, freezer, fridge, and dishwasher
cons: Some buyers thought the containers seemed smaller than marketed

customer_reviews.title: 74oz container was the real reason for my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ready since last Thanksgiving to replace my one gifted glass container. I mistakenly placed that one in the microwave on high w/lid and warped that lid beyond repair or further usage. These lids aren’t microwave safe on this set either. The glass is heavy and durable. Their easy to clean and don’t feel too hot to the touch after I microwave them. These are a great addition to my growing kitchen glass storage collection. By the end of this year, my household should be almost rid of plastic containers...forever.
customer_reviews.author: EIGHTIES'  KID!

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these storage containers while on a lightning deal. The larger sizes are wonderful and hard to find in a square, glass shape; and certainly not for $24.99. I needed something large enough to marinate in; to prepare potato salad/salad/whatever in the night before the family comes for Sunday dinner - it goes from fridge to table beautifully. The glass and band are a light greenish color - every brand has it’s own. I have just pulled one out of the dishwasher and it held up perfectly! When I need more, I will be back! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: GABnMcTEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Easy clip on lids and good sizes
customer_reviews.text: These Glass food storage containers are wonderful. Love the three handy large sizes. Plus the lids clip on firmly but easily. My hands don't work too well but these pretty lids go on without straining. Two thumbs up for this good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M

customer_reviews.title: Lids were slightly difficult to snap on for arthritic hands./Issue resolved.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this only three stars on ease of use because the lids were a little difficult to close. I have a little arthritis in my fingers and I had a difficulty snapping the lids closed. Plus the gasket on the large container arrived sliced on one side. The containers are heavy duty glass which is good. After customer service contacted me abut the gasket being damaged they resolved this issue to my satisfaction. I changed my rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AD New Mexico

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THESE THINGS
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes. Wish I could find some just a little larger, but these are wonderful. I plan to buy more of all the sizes available! I have read the reviews and I think that those who experience difficulty in using the lids, are just attempting to do it incorrectly. If you don't have them on properly, they won't snap shut, just line them up correctly and they go right on. This was my only worry and it is a moot point! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THESE THINGS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Gose

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large is so on point.
customer_reviews.text: I love the locking lids and I really liked the size/shape/depth of the containers. They are roomier than they look. I also like the doming of the lids; most other lids indent or are flush with the top of the canister, these lids dome a bit to allow a little extra room for airflow or an extra dollop of contents inside of each container. I'd purchase them again, hopefully when they go on sale again.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianHomeChef

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying glass containers to replace all the plastic containers that I would use to store food like leftovers etc. in the refrigerator, These work just fine. I like the way the lids snap on firmly and are easy to remove. Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love these containers. These containers have an excellent quality and I would say they are far superior in quality than Pyrex. The lids are perfectly airtight and the sizes are extremely useful. Would buy another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Container not meant for Freezer as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Totally NOT worth it !!!. I got these containers specifically for freezing food so I don't have to cook every week. The largest of all containers cracked within the 3 rd time I used it. I have been using snapware glass which is working better than this, I got this set for the size of the largest container meant for Freezer and very disappointed with the purchase. Now I don't used the other 2 containers in freezer anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. They are well made and the lids are super secure. I only have one very small suggestion. The container size should be on each piece. I am planning on buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: J Justin Berta

customer_reviews.title: These are helping me start the process of elimination as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are helping me start the process of elimination as much plastic as possible from my diet. Yes, the lids are still (food safe) plastic but they won't be in contact with the food.
customer_reviews.author: Frazer Hazlett

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Already broken after a couple months of use :( I’ve had my Pyrex sets for over 10 years and they are still going. This one broke in my dishwasher after under 2 months of use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glass storage containers!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I don't like plastic storage containers, and these are lovely, sturdy glass containers in three great sizes. PLUS, they're square and easy to fit into a fridge or freezer, and are very stackable. Completely satisfied with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: MKATL

customer_reviews.title: Rubber insert broke immediately, returning it is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: The good stuff: The sized are perfect, lids are really easy to use, construction, in general, seems more than acceptable. The bad stuff: The medium size "rubber" piece that prevents the liquids to escape the container got stuck on the glass and just tore when I removed the lid. I'm not sure if it was just a temperature issue, but now that piece is useless, I haven't been able to find just that replacement, and if I want to send it back for warranty I would need to send the entire set in order to get just a small piece of "plastic". It's like I purchased a big container, a small container, and a useless lid :P
customer_reviews.author: Leo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worst glass Tupperware I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: These things are horrible. They’re super heavy first of all and the lids don’t fit on. I literally just strained my wrist and spent 5 minutes trying to pop a lid on to the largest container. Every time I pop one side down the other side pops off. The smaller containers are no better. If you manage to eventually get the lid on it’s impossible to get off. I have no idea how people left good reviews for this product. Stick with Pyrex. Oh also if to stack them inside of each other for storage they get stuck and you have to run them under hot water to get them apart. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had these containers for only a short time and deeply regret the purchase for many reasons: They don’t seal on all sides. The seals themselves are already showing signs of mold despite my washing them after each use. The lids don’t appear to seat fully. The glass containers seem to be strong and durable but i would only use them for storing food for short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Flamethrower

customer_reviews.title: Tops are finicky
customer_reviews.text: I liked these sizes and overall was satisfied although the tops are a little finicky.. you have to make sure they are lined up just right on the rubber tracks or the plastic snaps won’t close. It seems like even though these are square lids, the lids only snap on one specific way.... which leads me to recently only a few months after purchasing these, I popped the lid on, snapped the snaps down, and one of the plastic pieces broke off. So my largest container now only has 3 snaps. I applied normal pressure... Hoping that another side doesn’t break off and force me to toss the container... ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect bowls, if they last
customer_reviews.text: we love these, we just thought they would last longer, one plastic part of the lid broke already and the rubber piece has to be manually put back in, could just be a faulty lid it only happened on one bowl, I will update the review again in 6 months
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for to store leftovers in the refrigerator. They are too heavy for me to use as lunch containers, but so perfect for home use. The lids are easy for my 90 year old mother to put on and take off. they only snap shut when full on the container. This is a great feature when living with an older person.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Cook once store twice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for large containers in glass and these fit the bill. The biggest is perfect for storing a second dinner when I cook ahead. I would like to be able to purchase the largest separately. Nice and heavy and no problem with the lid clicking solid.
customer_reviews.author: Texaswonder

customer_reviews.title: Great, space-saving airtight glass food storage!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls seem very sturdy, and the lids fit snugly and airtight. I swapped out all of my round Pyrex lidded bowls for these bowls, so now they fit/stack in my fridge and store in my cabinet much easier without wasted space. They seem so much smaller than the equivalent sized round bowls that I actually used a measuring cup of water to assure myself that they held the same amount as they old, round Pyrex. I use a paper towel between each of the stacked glass containers for cabinet storage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hausmann

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these. The rubber along the top of the glass comes off, making the plastic lids unable to seal. I was never able to get the lids on correctly. The lids that come with them have snaps on all sides. I never got all four to snap closed, there bye, giving you an airtight seal. Steer clear of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to get away from plastic for awhile now but been very selective about the product I wanted. These bowls and lids are wonderful. They are leak proof and the lids fit very well. They are well made and are the perfect size for all of my leftovers. I have no complaints about these storage bins and would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Dawson

customer_reviews.title: there good the 74oz was not as big as i thought
customer_reviews.text: there good the 74oz was not as big as i thought. started using them right away. the best time to a real review wait a year and lets see how the product held up
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Legg

customer_reviews.title: Lids do not stay snapped and can break easily
customer_reviews.text: From the getgo these tops did not stay snapped onto the glass bottom. One side would invariably un snap once “secured.” Then last night this happened. I have had these only a few months at most. Never buying this brand again - Snapware is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: The glass breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: The glass in this product is weak. I broke one container trying to get the lid to seal and cut myself. I should have thrown all of the containers away when that happened. The next failure was that the glass around the rim started to chip away from sealing the container and I found glass in the food I was storing. Don't buy these to use for food storage.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Wells

customer_reviews.title: It’s not as durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it’s big and spacious, but since I been using it, it does not close tight compare to other ones, so I wouldn’t recommend buying this because it loses is strength in the long run
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the containers
customer_reviews.text: I like the containers. Wish they made them larger. At least make a set of 3 that holds 2 quarts.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: I love these containers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! I try to only store food in glass containers so these are perfect! Not only are they great for storing food in the refrigerator but, I love that I can use these in the oven and the freezer. I can prepare ahead (or store leftovers), freeze, and bake...all in one container!
customer_reviews.author: RozR

customer_reviews.title: They fit in the refrigerator better and display the contents well
customer_reviews.text: I switched from round storage bowls to rectangular and square to save space in the refrigerator. It worked! These work with a prior set I purchased and stack well displaying the food easily. I can fit so much more on a shelf with these. I do not put the plastic lids in the dishwasher. If the lid does not snap shut on one side, I just rotate it and try again. It always seems to work the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Container
customer_reviews.text: Built to last forever, Awesome quality, heavy duty, great value , much better than the plastic storage ones, they wash squeaky clean and go great in the microwave, I’m very happy with the purchase , I really feel that these are better than the brand names , the lids are definitely better than the other higher priced brand names.
customer_reviews.author: victor contreras

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, highly recommend for all your food storage needs.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!! I have searched far and wide for perfect food storage containers. I purchased a few others from Amazon and was always disappointed by size, durability, airtight-lacking-qualities. Not with these!!!! I am SO pleased, they are great for weekly food prep, packing lunches, freezing food... They are incredible. Excellent size, no other glass set has been the right size for me. Super easy to clean, very airtight, very thick durable glass. SO worth the price, I bought 3 sets!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Few t :-) hide. F tee watch.

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: I recently changed over all of my storage containers to glass because I love how easy they are to clean and that they do not get those bubbles like the plastic ones after heating in the microwave (not to mention no red stains when you have spaghetti in them!!). So in my quest to change over all to glass I was looking for a few large containers that could store a lot in them and these look to be great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These containers are wonderful. They hold quite a bit. However, I still wanted larger ones and ordered the 80 oz. size. Now I'm pretty much set on containers. So far I have 3 different sets, different sizes, different shapes. So glad I purchased glass containers.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Our Glass Containers
customer_reviews.text: After reading how glass is much better storage than plastic, we visited several local businesses but couldn't find glass containers big enough. That's when we went to Amazon and found the Razab glass containers. Exactly what we were looking for. Perfect size. Bonus! We were scheduled to receive the glass containers in three to four days. We got them in two!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Broad

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Glass tupperware is awesome, but this tupperware did not function well for me. It closed so tightly I am unable to open the tupper and it presents with difficulty to snap close the lid. I also thought they would be bigger but they're about the same size as the glass Tupperware at publid for $9. I wish I could return these now but have already used them and cant even get my food out from inside of them. I asked my husband to attempt to open it as well and nothing. ):
customer_reviews.author: Ana L.

customer_reviews.title: 🥺 if you are not going to use all pieces of the pieces in the set inspect all once it arrives
customer_reviews.text: I really ordered this for the large container which I have only 2 complaints it not being leak proof however today I decided to use the small container but it was glass chip that fell off while unwrapping so I'm afraid to use it I don't want to get cut while handling it I think it's more of the packaging issue it should be packaged better since it is glass and I don't even what to check the middle size container I'm done it's still wrapped in original packaging but I know that I will not buy anything that is made of glass with my future online purchases
customer_reviews.author: 🤣😂🥰🥰sundae

customer_reviews.title: Leftover containers
customer_reviews.text: We love to use glass for leftovers and these are perfect. We needed the bigger ones because we could not find them locally, we bought them here. They are so much easier than plastic to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Glass not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: At first the item seemed pretty good until into the third day when I broke one of the containers. I dropped one from the bottom shelf (3 feet) of my fridge and the glass bottom just shattered everywhere. The glass is not very durable and for the price I purchase it, it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: MikeP

customer_reviews.title: Lids hard to snap on!
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very hard to snap on, is this normal
customer_reviews.author: T phim

customer_reviews.title: The snap on lid is not as tight as other brands.
customer_reviews.text: These containers are a nice variety as far as size but the lids are not sturdy enough for travel in a cooler. They come undone to easy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Roy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cracked but still work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for about a month or so, and have had a few issues. One shattered completely after a drop in the kitchen sink. I’m taking more of the responsibility on that since glass hitting ceramic, even from only about a foot and a half of height, is bound to do damage. However, the plastic top on one of the remaining containers has broken as well, cracking on one of the places it bends to snap onto the glass bottom. It still works but definitely impacts how leakproof that particular container is when closed. Other than that, the one container that is unbroken has been great, and is doing its job with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Nesteruk

customer_reviews.title: Food safety can be good looking
customer_reviews.text: The containers provide the highest level of safety when storing food. The covers snap into a seal of the glass dish. The set of three was well thought in terms of size, the deepest and largest can easily fit a half tray of left over lasagna when carefully cut and placed. The smaller containers each the right size for left over meals that at first glance one might think a larger container is needed. They hold more than one might expect. The seals are tight and give peace of mind that nothing will spoil. They look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scalisi

customer_reviews.title: LARGER GLASS STORAGE PIECES
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of smaller glass with tight fitting lids. I wanted larger to store fruit salad or salads etc. The largest will fit the bill - for salad for two people. I've gotten completely away from plastic storage/tupperware etc. I'm very happy with these - about to go make a fruit salad and store it in the fridge! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastMusicLover

customer_reviews.title: The extra large size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I are really impressed with these containers so far. The lids are some of the best I have seen on the market; feel, durability, ease of cleaning, locking clips...great! Have only had them a few weeks so if things change I will come back and update my review, but I don't think I will have to. Oh and packaging was done so well that even delivered with a damaged box nothing was broken. Will probably be purchasing more of the same if they have smaller sizes as well. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Temple

customer_reviews.title: OOPS!!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of "nesting" these. Middle size does NOT nest in larger size . Now the are nested forever......chipped......stuck......sigh :{
customer_reviews.author: Southerngal

customer_reviews.title: Have used several times already
customer_reviews.text: I have used two of the three, they do what they say they will. The lids are easy to pop into place and remove again. I have some others of the same design, that are very difficult to use b/c of the lids. They hold an amazing quantity of food.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Largest can fit a roasted whole chicken. Lock mechanism is sturdy. I don't know about leak proof because I didn't try it. PS: If there is no update on this review that means the product is great or I am no more 😬
customer_reviews.author: imana

customer_reviews.title: Really liked these until the locking tabs started to break off
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these for several months and have already had one of the locking tabs break off. Very disappointing as I really like these and would like to have them last. BTW, I only hand wash the lids, never run them through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndal E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to replace plastic containers with glass ones, but needed some larger ones, and these are perfect! Sizes are just what I needed, and lids sit snugly. Would purchase these again if I needed more of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Abney

customer_reviews.title: Glass containers are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. Three sizes, so versatile. I like that they’re square. Lids fit well. I have others from a different company and those lids are a bit difficult to match up. These are easier, maybe because square, not rectangular. Glad I bought them. I do wish the lids were also glass, but that’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pretty solid set
customer_reviews.text: These seem pretty solid. Haven’t used them much yet so can’t say how durable. The lids work fine. I’ve had better quality lids in the past with other name brands but the larger size was what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: sss333

customer_reviews.title: Large glass container with lid
customer_reviews.text: I had some difficulties closing lid but it seems it gets easier with time, I used largest one for storing left over pizza and middle one for bringing lunch to work. Price could be lower as I compared with similar set at Costco with twice the number of containers but only $20 instead of $25. However Costco ones are smaller than largest one in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice set and the large container is the star of the show. The lids fit snug, they are not hard to get on but does require some backbone to get off. Very pleased customer
customer_reviews.author: Stephen of Brittimus Esq.

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I really like those containers (so far). I was looking for containers that are 1. extra large 2. glass 3. can be used in microwave, oven and freezer 4. and have watertight lids and Razab HomeGoods set fits the bill. I would be even more happy if lids had vents and could be used in microwave but...
customer_reviews.author: Lina L

customer_reviews.title: Quite good and practical, except that the lid of the biggest one is a pain...it's flaw
customer_reviews.text: The biggest one is a pain many times to lock closed the lid. Otherwise the whole package would be good since the other two work quite well and they really keep frozen produce awesomely in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: thrilled to find some this size
customer_reviews.text: I am pulling away from everything plastic when it comes to storage. I was thrilled to find containers this size. I use larger sizes for watermelons and all things melon. These are perfection!
customer_reviews.author: penpal

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to snap the lids on
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes little difficult to snap the lids on. I need to use both hands at the same time. I love the sizes and that they are deep. I do not really know if they are durable since I have only had them a little while
customer_reviews.author: Flamenco Romántico

customer_reviews.title: That they don't leak and they are strong
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen any things about these food storage containers that I don't like mind have not leaked on me I brought them to storage food in i not try them in freeze yet but l like them
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: No Seal
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting an airtight seal, but you can see space between the lid edge and the container edge. I needed them in a hurry, so I kept them. They are pretty and clean up nicely. But disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Great containers!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. The sizes are good, the glass is sturdy, and the lids fit perfectly. These are replacements for my plastic containers. I will definitely buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Glass, better than plastic storage containers
customer_reviews.text: The lids were a little stiff at first, but work well after using for a few months. I purchased due to concerns over toxic plastic containers. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moving on

customer_reviews.title: Did not seal, was not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: While sturdy in design, the lip of the glassware was not substantial enough to enable the lid to lock in place, thus resulting in an unsealed container. When transporting, leaking is inevitable. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: YogAlicia

customer_reviews.title: Be VERY careful stacking these!
customer_reviews.text: LIke them - a lot - Sadly though in stacking them - to put them away after taking them out of the box - the middle size one chipped - and had to be tossed - before we even used it once. Sad. Seems like brittle glass?
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Love these containers
customer_reviews.text: These containers are very useful and wonderful. They can go into the oven, then into the refrigerator to keep leftovers. The glass does not stain nor absorb odors and are easy to clean. I have 4 sets of them in different sizes and shapes and love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Not as large, as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as large, as I though it would be, However; it will do. I would say the large bowl the 74oz look more medium size. Then extra large. The photo above is deceiving.. The 64oz Large bowl, look like the 40oz medium bowl. Too me.
customer_reviews.author: kristola 818

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my other sets.
customer_reviews.text: About the same size as oval sets I have. Was hoping they would hold a big salad, but no. However, very good quality, leakproof, and great to store
customer_reviews.author: D Empey

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: Small. The largest is still not big.. the other 2 sizes are tiny. I like them because they are thick glass but not big enough for meal prep.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Rotko

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Large glass containers are not easily found. This company offered a selection of larger containers. The containers arrived in perfect condition. We liked them so much that we ordered more. They're easy to clean and the tops are easily removable. 5 Stars Clicking In
customer_reviews.author: Clicking In

customer_reviews.title: Large containers
customer_reviews.text: I already had the small containers. I was disappointed. I expected something larger. They are nice but not large enough.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these containers are easy to clean and durable as well. I love glass containers and this was the right size for my family. Our leftovers and just right size to keep in our fridge. I don’t mind buying again since the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Cabal

customer_reviews.title: Useful...
customer_reviews.text: These are durable glass food containers. However the glass is very thick making the dish heavy. Lighter ones are easier to manage. That’s why only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot! Wish they were a little bigger. Lids can be a bit stubborn at times to put on but they do seal tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love the size options and amazing seal. I have transitioned ALL my plastic to glass. These make great gifts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maisoon Suleiman

customer_reviews.title: great size
customer_reviews.text: best one for dinner leftover, I prefer glass container before plastic easy cleaning no smell after what ever you put in
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Clunky Lids
customer_reviews.text: Each time I try and seal the lids, they seem to be off kilter. There's always adjusting, and moving and fighting to get them sealed. Even on sale, I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Harter

customer_reviews.title: It’s very functional
customer_reviews.text: eVery happy with the purchase. I have been trying to stay away from using plastic products lately and this works great. It is environmentally sound & safe. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: YTC

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This product does not reflect the correct size especially when it claims extra large. The largest is at most 64oz. Not worth the price probably worth at most $25.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect items but little pricey & clunky
customer_reviews.text: The lids don’t lock down well. Always have a problem with locking them down but they seal well. I have them over the year.
customer_reviews.author: Maham Ziabakhsh

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable. No leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I envisioned the largest one being bigger. But I love them, as I’m trying to phase out plastic Tupperware. Be sure not to microwave the lids or they will warp (this information brought to you by my 13 year old son. You’re welcome! 🤪
customer_reviews.author: jessiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good value and great locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: Love it for storing all sorts of leftovers and prepped food. My only complaint is it’s a little fragile as a tab broke after some use after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Yong H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as I needed to store with larger containers. As expected, but can be a little difficult to snap close...just need to pay attention and line up the tops properly! I would recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: #1 large glass container
customer_reviews.text: My favorite multi purpose containers by far. I highly recommend them: ) #1 quality!
customer_reviews.author: mslyndareed

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller then I thought they would be but they are just right for two people as serving bowls and for leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: It is a great item I use it to store frozen items such ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great item I use it to store frozen items such a veggies and cake. Place get it again as I want to get another set. Also can store nested puttimg tops on the bottom of next largest and the largest top on the nested set.
customer_reviews.author: Baruch R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like that they are heavy-duty glass. The lid not always easy to put on. Not sure I can clean the lid as well as I’d like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size we need and the lids are easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We picked these due to the large size for big batches of left overs, and the glass container allows, direct to the microwave from the refrigerator. The lids are easy to snap shut and open.
customer_reviews.author: mikey6948

customer_reviews.title: No fridge mess!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for soup and chili...especially runny liquid leftovers, and they didn’t leak! Getting rid of all my plastic containers!!!
customer_reviews.author: JUDY From Austin

customer_reviews.title: worth the extra to purchase glass over plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to warm up and not worry about plastic or chemicals so these were a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: very nice product. great, practical sizes and the lids work great. feels substantial. ordered for a vacation rental and believe product will stand up to use by many different people. nice color too.
customer_reviews.author: Tia H

customer_reviews.title: Lids are weak
customer_reviews.text: Two of the snaps broke on different lids within a month and a half. I use these to hold "juicy" things that I definitely don't want leaking in my bag or car, so now they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: "Airtight lid" doesn't close
customer_reviews.text: After trying to use the larger of the containers for the first time today, I discover that the "airtight lid" doesn't close on all 4 sides, rendering it almost useless for purposes of maintaining the integrity of the food while attempting to freeze food. I should have read the reviews. I would have known that.
customer_reviews.author: William wade

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Durable, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far its good, I love it! Good for the money too. Durable, good quality. I gave 4 stars because one of the container's snap is giving me a hard time, but its probably my luck. The rest are fine. I might order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Sevul'

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of storage container. The shipping was fast, maybe too fast as largest container in box was in pieces. Too much trouble to return, but dropped my rating.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: like the shape but rather heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like these containers but they seem especially heavy. Work well in storing and baking.
customer_reviews.author: G B

customer_reviews.title: bad lid / doesn't nest
customer_reviews.text: The lid on the large container doesn't lock tight and keeps popping open. The medium container doesn't nestle in the large container and is just waiting to splinter the edge later sometime because it's slightly too big.
customer_reviews.author: pityopus

customer_reviews.title: ... environmentally damaging all plastic containers to reusable glass was easy thanks to these
customer_reviews.text: Making the switch from environmentally damaging all plastic containers to reusable glass was easy thanks to these. I couldn’t find any that didn’t have plastic lids, but these are heavy duty, multi-use and far more eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids aren’t durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked these containers fine until one of the lids broke today. We’ve only had them a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with one broken
customer_reviews.text: Nice glass storage containers. Unfortunately, only two arrived unbroken. So I have paid the same price for only two.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett(MA)

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the three pc's were broken and a piece of broken glass fell on my foot cutting top of foot very pore packing on the 3 glass containers with lids no cardboard just thine bubble wrap.Now what do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Extra Large Glass Food Storage Containers with Airtight Lid 6 Pc [3 containers with lids] Microwave/Oven/Freezer & Dishwasher Safe. BPA/PVC Free X-Large/Large/Medium Size Reusable Square container set
product_meta.description:
Razab 6 Piece Glass Food Storage Containers w/Airtight Lids (3 Container Set) - Microwave/Oven/Freezer & Dishwasher Safe - PVC Free - Extra- *Food can be directly stored to the containers after cooking.

FEATURES:
*Set Includes 3 BPA-Free Borosilicate Glass Containers And 3 Plastic Airtight Locking Lids.
* Borosilicate Glass More Heat Resistant Than Pyrex Glass.
*Microwave, Dishwasher And Oven Safe. Plastic Lids Are Not Safe For Use In Microwave or Oven. Lids Are Dishwasher, Refrigerator And Freezer Safe. 
*Safely Store and Keeps Food, Fruits And Vegetables Fresh.
*Made Of Environmentally Friendly, Non-Toxic and BPA Free Premium Borosilicate Glass.
*Easily stackable for storage in Refrigerator and freezer.
*Food can be directly stored to the containers after cooking.
* Ideal for meal prep, storage, baking, etc.
feature_bullets: LARGEST GLASS CONTAINER SET on Amazon. BPA Free and Non-Toxic. Includes 3 Glass Food Storage Containers In Extra-Large 74 oz (2200 ml), Large 40 oz (1200 ml) And Medium 27 oz (800 ml) sizes.
AIRTIGHT AND WATERTIGHT Silicone Sealed BPA-Free Plastic Lids (Plastic Lids are Not Microwave Or Oven Safe).

VERSATILE USE - Reusable Refrigerator-, Freezer-, Microwave- And Dishwasher-Safe (Top Shelf of Dishwasher Recommended), Oven Safe Up To 932 Degrees Fahrenheit Without The Lid (Do Not Put Plastic Lids In Oven or microwave).
SQUARE GLASS FOOD CONTAINERS - Keep Leftovers Fresh, Goes Straight From The Refrigerator To The Microwave Or Oven To The Table. Food Can Be Cooked Directly In The Containers Using Microwave or Oven.
Three UNIQUE SIZES - Food Storage Set Includes Extra Large, Large and Medium Capacity Containers. 2200 Ml (9.30 Cups). 1200 Ml (5 Cups) and 800 Ml (3.4 Cups).
